text:
RT @RoKhanna .@aoc facts. Only 1.4% of the benefits of free college go to the 1%. 98.6% to everyone else including middle class kids. How do we pay for it? How about in a knowledge economy we invest in education instead of the $100 billion Trump defense increase & endless wars. @JHWeissmann https://twitter.com/aoc/status/1200261361391017984 QT @AOC This is a GOP talking point used to dismantle public systems, & it’s sad to see a Dem candidate adopt it.

Let’s talk about why Republicans are wrong on this.

Just like rich kids can attend public school, they should be able to attend tuition-free public college. 

Here’s why. https://twitter.com/alxthomp/status/1200227721923760130

If you’re injured as an athlete playing for your college or university, then your school should cover your medical expenses while under treatment. That's not the case today. We need to change this: https://corybooker.com/justiceforathletes

When a private equity firm acquired a doctors group, patients experienced more aggressive medical debt collection lawsuits. Wall Street shouldn't be profiting off of the poorest patients. We need to rein in Wall Street—and we need #MedicareForAll. https://www.propublica.org/article/this-doctors-group-is-owned-by-a-private-equity-firm-and-repeatedly-sued-the-poor-until-we-called-them

RT @Deb4CongressNM "I lived in a world where abortion was illegal and all I can say is some women got lucky, some women didn’t, but they all went through hell. We’re not going back. Not now and not ever." -@ewarren 

One of the reasons why I'm on #TeamWarren
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/25/us/politics/democratic-candidates-abortion-survey.html#link-6a161632

Climate change is an existential threat, and it's going to take a grassroots movement ready to fight for big, structural change to defeat it. I'm standing with the young activists on #ClimateStrike today—stay strong in this fight! https://twitter.com/ThisIsZeroHour/status/1200202876452139008 QT @ThisIsZeroHour Today on #thanksgiving 🍽, we eat and convince our family members to join us in the fight for climate justice.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Tomorrow, we don’t go #blackfriday shopping, instead WE STRIKE for climate action! ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Find a #climatestrike near you 👇🏼 
https://strikewithus.org http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKf6JzcVAAkRu5c.jpg

Justice is on the ballot when people are spending weeks, months, and years in jail because they can’t afford bail. No more—as president, I’ll fight to end the money bail system. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKjDeawXYAkvLVR.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1200421326462345217/vid/320x320/pOgkNv3X75CRAmRn.mp4?tag=13

RT @RedState Media Claims Trump 'Tweeting and Golfing' on Thanksgiving While He's Actually Visiting Troops in Afghanistan https://redstate.com//nick-arama/2019/11/28/media-claims-trump-tweeting-and-golfing-on-thanksgiving-while-hes-actually-visiting-troops-in-afghanistan/

In some communities, Native American women are murdered at a rate of 10x the national average. Countless Native women and girls have been murdered or are missing. This issue urgently needs our attention.

I cosponsored Savanna's Act to help combat this crisis. #MMIWG
@SonnyBunch http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKlD1oYX0AAz-fK.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKlD1oWW4AAqHkM.jpg

The Trump administration ripped thousands of children away from their parents and knew they would have trouble reunifying them.

They estimated 26K children could be affected, and they did it anyway.

This is human rights abuse, full stop. https://twitter.com/juliaeainsley/status/1199756943839105024 QT @JuliaEAinsley DHS IG shows CBP officials knew they would have problems reunifying families, but they went ahead with a plan they estimated would separate 26K kids in 2018 w/ @jacobsoboroff https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/immigration/trump-admin-projected-it-would-separate-26-000-migrant-kids-n1092571

The problems we face as a nation may seem insurmountable.

But if there ever was a time when despair was not an option, now is that time.

If we organize, if we stand together, if we refuse to let Trump divide us, we will win.

I’m proud that the average contribution to our campaign is $26. That’s because our campaign is funded by small-dollar donors, not fancy fundraisers, billionaires, or PACs. 

Chip in now—$26, or $3, or whatever you can—to keep our movement growing. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/soc-nov19fr?refcode=soc-FR-ew-tw-eom-20191127
It’s moments like 🥰 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKjlMxzX0AAovR-.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1200461172413210624/vid/320x320/WgaS4hBBLZsXrTU2.mp4?tag=13

RT @NNUBonnie This endorsement is about more than just advancing one leader; it’s about advancing a grassroots movement for change.

It’s about “us” — the #nurses, the patients, the families, the communities that @BernieSanders is dedicated to uplifting. #NotMeUs https://thehill.com/opinion/healthcare/471743-nurses-across-the-us-just-endorsed-bernie-sanders-heres-why?rnd=1574465098

RT @PramilaJayapal The Green New Deal is an economic and environmental imperative. Doing nothing is the radical position.
https://twitter.com/SierraClub/status/1199793784021823489 QT @SierraClub In bleak report, U.N. says drastic action is only way to avoid worst effects of climate change https://www.washingtonpost.com/climate-environment/2019/11/26/bleak-report-un-says-drastic-action-is-only-way-avoid-worst-impacts-climate-change/ @washingtonpost @brady_dennis
The strength of our union isn’t in the walls we build. Our power is found in our diversity.

The right to vote is one of the most sacred rights in a democratic society. We can protect and expand access to the ballot box by:

✅ Restoring the Voting Rights Act
✅ Making Election Day a national holiday
✅ Implementing universal automatic voter registration

I stopped by Corinthian Gardens apartments in Des Moines more than a decade ago to canvass for Barack Obama. It was lovely seeing Glen again yesterday after all these years—and even more heartwarming that he remembered me. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKi-xW_XUAMLrpt.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1200417465018322945/vid/320x320/am1daE07orBzGNvb.mp4?tag=13
Praying for all impacted by today’s violent attacks in London & The Hague. The American people stand with our British and Dutch friends at this dark time.

It's a point I've made since my very first campaign: Nobody in this country got rich on their own. They relied on infrastructure we all paid for, employees we all paid to educate. So if you're successful, good for you—now pay it forward so everyone has a chance at success. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKkuqw7U8AAB0Vi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1200533982544183296/vid/480x270/slEDVbJl5pMd-26P.mp4?tag=13

"Tax me!" Let's listen to these Patriotic Millionaires who want their taxes raised, not cut. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DSt6mmRWAAAH2fZ.png https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/948985896292012037/vid/240x240/JQVXiGSMSWqPXUjv.mp4

Tribal Nations must be able to protect their citizens from domestic violence by non-Native perpetrators. The Violence Against Women Act must be reauthorized and recognize Tribal Nations' inherent authority to prosecute non-Natives who commit these crimes. 
https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/clarissajanlim/violence-indigenous-women-vawa-concern-congress-ernst

Amazon is one of the largest corporations in the world, but it paid $0 in federal income taxes.

It's owned by Jeff Bezos, the second-richest person on Earth.

It is not too much to demand it guarantees safe and decent working conditions for every worker.

#BlackFriday http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKkjCvPXsAA2PwY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1200526954459488256/vid/480x270/Q3NB-Acty8PZ3aa9.mp4?tag=13

I saw coming with the clouds of heaven One like a son of man. When he reached the Ancient of Days & was presented before him,
He received dominion, splendor,&kingship; all nations, peoples & tongues will serve him.His dominion is an everlasting dominion...

Daniel 7:13-14

We need your help. There are only two days left in the month and we’re trying to raise enough money online to make this video an ad in Iowa. Chip in today to make this happen.

Just finished @ConLawWarrior’s ‘Terms of Engagement.’ A great read for anyone who believes that the judiciary should presume liberty and not allow the scales of justice to give favoritism to government. https://www.amazon.com/Terms-Engagement-Enforce-Constitutions-Government/dp/1594036969/ref=nodl_

A combined household income of $100k isn’t even “children of millionaires” territory.

That’s two parents making $50k/each. Does that sound rich to you? 

It’s not. It’s a working family. And just as tuition-free K-12 public school was an option, tuition-free K-16 should be too. https://twitter.com/ryangrim/status/1200501309478260741 QT @ryangrim Buttigieg thinks that if your combined household income is more than $100k/yr you can be lumped in rhetorically with billionaires and should be cut out of the free public college pool https://twitter.com/hollyotterbein/status/1200395573100269569

Everywhere I go, I let people know: if we win, I’ll be asking for more from you. Not to put up with more injustice, but to engage more—to join, to march, to fight. Our country doesn’t need a savior—it needs us to show up and do the work. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKldrY1XsAATqbN.jpg

America must uphold its commitments and promises to Tribal Nations and indigenous peoples—and give them a fighting chance to build stronger communities and a brighter future. I've got a plan for that. #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/tribal-nations?source=soc-WB-ew-tw

RT @RWDSU Life in retail as told by our members of @RWDSU, a Local 1-S @Macys worker & @Local1102 @ZARA worker, and a @RetailAction member. This #Thanksgiving be nice to a retail worker. @mcorkery5 for The @nytimesbusiness @nytimes reports: https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/28/business/retail-workers-black-friday.html #1u @CentralLaborNYC

I got a high-quality public education for just $50 a semester—but that opportunity doesn't exist today. States invested less in our public colleges and shifted the burden onto students. 

I'm fighting for universal public college so every student has the opportunity to succeed.

Thankful for the opportunity to serve meals to members of our SF community experiencing homelessness & hardship this week at @stanthonysf. https://twitter.com/stanthonysf/status/1200077152349114368 QT @stanthonysf Yesterday @SpeakerPelosi visited St. Anthony's to continue a beloved tradition of volunteering w/ her family during the holidays! Here at the start of her shift, Madam Speaker waits eagerly to begin serving a meal to people experiencing homelessness and hardship in San Francisco. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKeHvynVAAEV5vZ.jpg

RT @SenSanders "Tax me!" Let's listen to these Patriotic Millionaires who want their taxes raised, not cut. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DSt6mmRWAAAH2fZ.png https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/948985896292012037/vid/240x240/JQVXiGSMSWqPXUjv.mp4

DHS created a fake university & accepted immigrants on student visas. When it was shut down, DHS tried deporting some of these students because they weren’t enrolled in school.

This isn’t just cruel, it’s a waste of taxpayer dollars. Officials must be held accountable for this. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1200129499049922560 QT @washingtonpost ICE set up a fake university, then arrested 250 people granted student visas https://trib.al/5lX55Om
Tener estudiantes con diferentes ingresos & orígenes en el mismo salón de clase es bueno para la sociedad & la movilidad económica.
5.Finalmente, y no puedo creer que tenemos que recordarle a la gente esto, pero es BUENO tener salones de clase (desde el pre-k hasta la universidad!) que estén socioeconómicamente integrados.
http://4.De cualquier forma, muchos de los hijos de la elite quieren ir a escuelas privadas, tipo Ivy, las cuales no están cubiertas por las universidades públicas sin colegiatura!
3.Cuando empezamos a excluir & a añadir asteriscos a quien se puede beneficiar de los bienes los cuales deben estar disponibles para todos, se desarrollan grietas en el sistema.
2.¡Sistemas universales que benefician a todos son más fuertes xq todos invierten!

1.¡Sistemas públicos universales son diseñados para beneficiar A TODOS! Todos contribuyen & todos disfrutan. No excluimos a los ricos de escuelas públicas, bomberos, o bibliotecas porque son bienes públicos.

Así como los niños ricos pueden asistir a escuelas públicas, deberían poder asistir a colegios público gratuitos. 

Esto es el porque

Este es un tema de discusión de los Republicanos usado para desmantelar los sistemas públicos, & es triste ver que un candidato Demócrata lo esté adoptando.

Hablemos de porque los Republicanos están equivocados sobre esto. https://twitter.com/AlxThomp/status/1200227721923760130 QT @AlxThomp New Pete ad in Iowa taking aim at Warren and Bernie over college affordability/debt (but not by name), arguing they’d alienate half the country by insisting it be “free even for the kids of millionaires”. H/t @McCormickJohn 
 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1200223509152223232/pu/img/2P2OVJC6N2P3tLfr.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1200223509152223232/pu/vid/480x270/95UAEKYPUBTxzugY.mp4?tag=10
¡La gratitud es una práctica! ¿De que estas agradecidx este año?

Esperando que todos estén disfrutando de un caluroso y Feliz Día de Acción de Gracias. 

Estoy agradecida por muchas cosas este año: mi familia, amigos, y seres queridos; la bendición de una buena salud, & la oportunidad de servir a nuestra comunidad y a nuestro país.
